attributes.action: Bring in legislation to ban the use of Megaphone Exhaust pipes for Cars and MotorBikes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The number of noisy cars and motorbikes increases all the time, There is nothing worse than a car travelling through a housing estate where there is traffic calming measures. The traffice calming causes motorists to slow down to drive over the obstacles then accelerate up to the next one. Cars with these exhausts just "love" to put their foot down between the bumps so making a real racket. There is nothing worse, especially at night when you are trying to get to sleep.
